faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: Can I change my plan anytime?
faq.answer1: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately and we'll prorate any charges.
faq.question2: What happens when my trial ends?
faq.answer2: When your 30-day trial ends, you'll need to choose a paid plan to continue using the service. Your data will be preserved.
faq.answer3: Yes, you can cancel anytime. You'll continue to have access until the end of your current billing period.

banner.title: Cookie Consent
banner.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience. You can customize your preferences or accept all cookies.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, authentication, and accessibility.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make (such as language or theme) to provide enhanced, more personalized features.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display ads that are relevant and engaging for individual users.

modal.title: Cookie Preferences
modal.description: We use different types of cookies to optimize your experience on our website. You can choose which categories of cookies you want to allow.

status.customized: You have customized your cookie preferences.
status.notSet: You have not set your cookie preferences yet.

privacy.pageDescription: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in compliance with GDPR
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At AI Knowledge Companion, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service, in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable data protection laws.

account.title: Account Information
account.email: Email address (for account creation and communication)
account.name: Name or username (for personalization)

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Data
howWeUse.provide: To provide and maintain our service
howWeUse.improve: To improve and personalize your experience
howWeUse.communicate: To communicate with you about service updates
howWeUse.security: To detect and prevent fraud and security issues

contract.title: Contract Performance
contract.content: We process your data to perform our contract with you (providing the AI tutoring service).

consent.title: Consent
consent.content: For optional features like analytics cookies, we ask for your explicit consent.

legitimate.title: Legitimate Interest
legitimate.content: We process data for our legitimate business interests (e.g., fraud prevention, improving our service).

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Third Parties
dataSharing.openai: OpenAI: For AI processing (subject to OpenAI's privacy policy)
dataSharing.supabase: Supabase: For database and authentication (subject to Supabase's privacy policy)
dataSharing.stripe: Stripe: For payment processing (subject to Stripe's privacy policy)
dataSharing.hosting: Hosting providers: For infrastructure (subject to their privacy policies)

access.title: Right to Access
access.content: You can request a copy of your personal data

erasure.title: Right to Erasure
erasure.content: You can request deletion of your data

portability.title: Right to Data Portability
portability.content: You can export your data in a machine-readable format

restriction.title: Right to Restriction
restriction.content: You can request we limit processing of your data

objection.title: Right to Object
objection.content: You can object to certain types of processing

withdraw.title: Right to Withdraw Consent
withdraw.content: You can withdraw consent at any time

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy, or as required by law. When you delete your account, we permanently delete your personal data within 30 days, except where we must retain it for legal compliance.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes encryption, secure authentication, regular security audits, and access controls.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies as described in our Cookie Policy. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time through our cookie consent banner.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not intended for users under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If you believe we have collected data from a child, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through a prominent notice on our service. Your continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your GDPR rights, please contact us:

terms.pageTitle: Terms of Service | AI Knowledge Companion
terms.pageDescription: Terms and conditions for using the AI Knowledge Companion service
terms.title: Terms of Service

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to AI Knowledge Companion. These Terms of Service govern your use of our AI-powered tutoring platform. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By creating an account and using our service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our service.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: AI Knowledge Companion provides an AI-powered tutoring platform where users can upload documents, create personalized AI tutors, and engage in educational conversations. The service uses advanced AI models to provide learning assistance.

account.title: Account Responsibilities
account.accurate: You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account
account.security: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials
account.unauthorized: You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access
account.responsibility: You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account

restrictions.title: Prohibited Uses
restrictions.illegal: Use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
restrictions.abuse: Harass, abuse, or harm other users
restrictions.interference: Interfere with or disrupt the service or servers
restrictions.automated: Use automated systems or bots without permission
restrictions.resell: Resell or redistribute the service without authorization

yourContent.title: Your Content
yourContent.content: You retain ownership of content you upload. By uploading content, you grant us a license to process, store, and display it as necessary to provide the service. You are responsible for ensuring you have the rights to upload your content.

ourContent.title: Our Content
ourContent.content: The service, including its design, features, and functionality, is owned by AI Knowledge Companion and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, or create derivative works without our permission.

payments.title: Subscriptions and Payments
payments.billing: Subscription fees are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis
payments.cancellation: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings
payments.refunds: Refunds are provided on a case-by-case basis at our discretion
payments.changes: We may change subscription prices with 30 days' notice

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account if you violate these Terms of Service, engage in fraudulent activity, or for any other reason at our discretion. You may delete your account at any time from your account settings.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: The service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of AI-generated content. The service is for educational purposes only and should not replace professional advice.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, AI Knowledge Companion shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the past 12 months.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through a notice on the service. Your continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

law.title: Governing Law
law.content: These Terms of Service are governed by the laws of the European Union and the country where the service is operated. Any disputes shall be resolved in the appropriate courts.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

cookiePolicy.pageDescription: Learn about how we use cookies and similar technologies
cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: This Cookie Policy explains how AI Knowledge Companion uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our service. It explains what these technologies are, why we use them, and your rights to control their use.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners. Cookies can be "persistent" (remain after you close your browser) or "session" (deleted when you close your browser).

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies (Always Active)
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, authentication, and network management.
necessary.examples: Examples: Session authentication, security tokens, load balancing

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies (Optional)
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This helps us improve the service.
analytics.examples: Examples: Page views, user paths, error tracking, performance metrics

preferences.title: Preference Cookies (Optional)
preferences.description: These cookies allow our website to remember choices you make (such as your language preference or region) and provide enhanced, more personalized features.
preferences.examples: Examples: Language selection, theme preferences, UI customizations

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies (Optional)
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant and engaging advertisements. We currently do not use marketing cookies.
marketing.examples: Examples: Ad personalization, campaign tracking, conversion pixels (not currently used)

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: In addition to our own cookies, we may use third-party cookies from trusted partners:

managing.title: Managing Your Cookie Preferences
managing.content: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time through our cookie consent banner. You can:
managing.banner: Click below to open cookie settings:

browser.title: Browser Controls
browser.content: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can set your browser to refuse cookies or delete certain cookies. Please note that disabling necessary cookies may affect the functionality of the service.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal reasons. We will notify you of significant changes through our service.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a question or need help? We're here to assist you.
